help:
[CSWP] Community Shader Weather Pack by Sam@ke / Ren_172
Version: 0.1 State: Alpha
Configurations: "F2" - Opens shader panel "F3" - Quick enable/disable all shaders (for comparing) "I" - starts recording new demo "O" - press for "O" saving coords while recording "U" - play demo
Keys are configurable into script files!!! All shaders can be enabled/disabled by client ("F2" Panel") and for whole server (Admin Panel).
